Content.summary: 'Hai Ha Three chilli rated' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about Hospitality Recreation written on 08 November 2006
Content.tags: Hospitality Recreation, Vietnamese, Bun Bo Hue
Content.bodyText:
Visited: 05/11/2006

Three chilli rated

http://www.timeout.com/london/restaurants/reviews/3945.html
206 Mare Street, Hackney E8 3RD

An average Bun bo Hue at this place in Hackney. The stock was spicy but one dimensional. The beef was also a little fatty. We are yet to visit the other venues on Mare street, so can't tell you whether this is the best just yet.

Good for: Good chilli kick to the stock.
Bad for: Herb portions were very small and had no fresh chillis.
